T

TestLogic - Class in <Unnamed>
TestLogic.java This class illustrates a sample complete Naive Bayes Test; including feature selection.
TestLogic(String, String, String, double) - Constructor for class TestLogic
Default comparator override.
TestOnRealData() - Method in class TestLogic
A naive method calculating estimation probabilities for the category of a test document; given the a priori, as well as a posteriori probabilities for the appearence of each word in the vocabulary dataset; including k-Best features usage for the computations, selected based on their pre-calculated information gain, picturing how uncertain we are about determining a document's category.
TestOnTrainData() - Method in class TestLogic
A naive method calculating estimation probabilities for the category of a train document; given the a priori, as well as a posteriori probabilities for the appearence of each word in the vocabulary dataset; including k-Best features usage for the computations, selected based on their pre-calculated information gain, picturing how uncertain we are about determining a document's category.
Tests - Class in <Unnamed>
Tests.java Executable file proceeding with all Naive Bayes designed tests.
Tests() - Constructor for class Tests
 
TN - Variable in class NaiveBayes
 
toString() - Method in class Vec2
Implementation of overridden method toString.
TP - Variable in class NaiveBayes
 
TrainNaiveBayes() - Method in class TestLogic
A method enabling calculation of the a priori probabilities, as well as a priori enthropy, for the appearences of each category; using the precalculated a priori probabilities but not the context of the datasets.
